value:
$WmMEID_ニフル,ch00_37_Nifl_F_Normal,Face|Fjorm. Be still.$k$pMúspell has come.$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Here?!$k$p$WmMEID_ニフル,ch00_37_Nifl_F_Normal,Face|He has likely granted his power to a
mortal and made it his champion.$k$pYou will need my power to have any
chance of opposing them...$k$pKneel. And close your eyes.$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face|Y-yes...$k$p$WmMEID_ニフル,ch00_37_Nifl_F_Normal,Face|As ice wills...$k$pYou are my champion.$k$pYou are my weapon, my shield,
my child...born anew.$k$p$SspSE_SUMMON_STONE_FLASH|$Fo3000,255,255,255,255|$WmMPID_開花フィヨルム味方,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Bloom01,Face|$Fi3000|$w0|Wh-what is—$k$p$WmMEID_ニフル,ch00_37_Nifl_F_Normal,Face|As my champion, you have been
granted the power of the ice god.
My power.$k$pWield this power as a tool to bring low
the god who would oppose me.$k$pBut not yet!$k$pUse it only when it has come time
to face Múspell's chosen champion.$k$p$Fo3000,255,255,255,255|$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face|$Fi3000|$w0|But who is Múspell's champion? I know
of no one who it could possibly be...$k$p$WmMEID_ニフル,ch00_37_Nifl_F_Normal,Face|It makes no difference. They are your
enemy, and they mean to kill you.
Remember that, for your own sake.$k$pYou must not die. You must survive.$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Lady Nifl...$k$p$WmMEID_ニフル,ch00_37_Nifl_F_Normal,Face|Silence.$k$pWipe that pleased look off your face.$k$pDo not mistake my interest in your
survival for some juvenile sense
of emotional attachment.$k$pNow, come.$k$p$Fo3000,0,0,0,255|$WmMEID_ムスペル,ch00_38_Muspell_M_Normal,Face|$Fi3000|Good, good... Now you are now the
champion of Múspell!$k$p$WmMPID_レーギャルン,ch00_11_Laegjarn_F_Normal,Face|...$k$p$WmMEID_ムスペル,ch00_38_Muspell_M_Normal,Face|No gratitude? Don't you know a dog
ought to wag its tail and beg when
offered a treat?!$k$p$WmMPID_レーギャルン,ch00_11_Laegjarn_F_Normal,Face_Pain|...Hng-gyah!$k$p$WmMEID_ムスペル,ch00_38_Muspell_M_Normal,Face|Now use my power to kill
Nifl's champion!$k$p...Or try. But they will have a power
similar to your own.$k$pAnd how do you imagine that might
play out on the battlefield?$k$p$WmMPID_レーギャルン,ch00_11_Laegjarn_F_Normal,Face|If we each use our power to defeat the
other, then...it will be a draw.$k$p$WmMEID_ムスペル,ch00_38_Muspell_M_Normal,Face|Correct. The powers I and Nifl wield
are equal.$k$p$WmMPID_レーギャルン,ch00_11_Laegjarn_F_Normal,Face|...You gods may have power far
beyond that of mortals...$k$pI cannot say the same when it comes
to your strategy, however.$k$p$WmMEID_ムスペル,ch00_38_Muspell_M_Normal,Face|What?!$k$p$WmMPID_レーギャルン,ch00_11_Laegjarn_F_Normal,Face|Your powers are equally matched...
Your champions fight to a draw...
How do you plan to win?$k$p$WmMEID_ムスペル,ch00_38_Muspell_M_Normal,Face|Heh heh! Indeed!$k$pAh... Since I'm in a good mood, allow
me to let you in on something...$k$pMy victory is decided. From the very
beginning, when the nine realms
first came to be.$k$pIt was all laid out in the Twilit Runes.$k$p$WmMPID_レーギャルン,ch00_11_Laegjarn_F_Normal,Face|What are...the Twilit Runes?$k$p$Fo3000,0,0,0,255|$WmMPID_トール,ch00_22_Tor_F_Normal,Face|$Fi3000|...$k$pThe Twilit Runes are prophecy.
The unavoidable future.$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|They were written by Alfaðör himself,
and they tell of how the gods will one
day come to ruin...$k$pWithin them, all of time, from the very
beginning to the absolute end of it all.$k$p

$WmMEID_ムスペル,ch00_38_Muspell_M_Normal,Face|So, I have no need to plan; I can
TELL you how the fight will end.$k$pNow, take this, dog. Catch.$k$p$WmMPID_レーギャルン,ch00_11_Laegjarn_F_Normal,Face|...Th-this stone!$k$pIt's just like the one my father—
Where did this come from?!$k$p$WmMEID_ムスペル,ch00_38_Muspell_M_Normal,Face|That stone is your lifeblood:
the Flame Gem.$k$pIt will return you to life if you die.$k$pThe Twilit Runes say, "Two gods
war, their champions spill blood...$k$p"Ice melts while the flame remains...$k$p"Pierced by frost, the Flame Gem
rekindles, the champion renewed."$k$pNow, you tell me what you think
will happen...$k$p$WmMPID_レーギャルン,ch00_11_Laegjarn_F_Normal,Face_Pain|...Princess Fjorm and I will fight.
She will strike me down. And this
gem will resurrect me.$k$p$WmMEID_ムスペル,ch00_38_Muspell_M_Normal,Face|Good girl. Well done.$k$pSo you can see, it's simple. I win.$k$p$WmMPID_レーギャルン,ch00_11_Laegjarn_F_Normal,Face|...$k$p$WmMEID_ムスペル,ch00_38_Muspell_M_Normal,Face|HAH! It will be something to see...
How do you think that ice brat
will perform? What will she do?$k$pCry? Scream?$k$pAnd then you'll kill each other!$k$p$WmMPID_レーギャルン,ch00_11_Laegjarn_F_Normal,Face_Pain|...How much humiliation am
I expected to bear? This blood
I've inherited...$k$pThe blood of someone as low,
as petty as you...$k$p$WmMEID_ムスペル,ch00_38_Muspell_M_Normal,Face|Hah! Did I ask you to speak, dog?
More discipline is needed, it seems!
One more thing to look forward to.$k$pBut for now... Where are you, Nifl?!$k$p$Fo3000,0,0,0,255|$WmMPID_トール,ch00_22_Tor_F_Normal,Face_Anger|$Fi3000|...$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|My, that is some scowl you're
wearing. What could be troubling
you so, I wonder?$k$pIce, flame, and their champions are
on the move. Their fight is about to
begin! Where's your excitement?$k$p$WmMPID_トール,ch00_22_Tor_F_Normal,Face_Anger|...They've both put everything on the
line for this fight. As such, they are
worthy of respect.$k$pThe result of this battle, however,
has already been decided...$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|And so you find it unsatisfactory?$k$p$WmMPID_トール,ch00_22_Tor_F_Normal,Face_Anger|...Of course not. It is Alfaðör's will,
and we are his servants. There is
no room for dissatisfaction.$k$pThere is one question I do have,
though, Loki...$k$pHow is it that Múspell knows the
content of the Twilit Runes?$k$pYou told him, did you not? What is
your play here, exactly?$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|Well, as you said... It doesn't matter
what I do, does it? It is Alfaðör's will,
and we are his servants and all...$k$pNothing we do can change the
course of time as it was decided
in the time of creation... Right?$k$p$EFace_Cool|We ought to embrace the opportunity
to enjoy a good fight! We wouldn't
want it to go to waste...$k$p
